QuestData.Title: Needle Me Not
QuestData.Description: The Arboretum is our home, a safe haven where we raise young hatchlings and train our students.$B$BUnfortunately, there are other, more dangerous creatures who wish to make this their home as well.$B$BTo the north, beyond the river, we have seen a great wasp feeding on the nectar blossoms.$B$BThis creature has already stung several of our students.$B$BUse this honey to lure the wasp out of hiding. Then, destroy it before it harms anyone else.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the honey at the northern clearing in The Arboretum, and then kill the Orchard Needler.
